scripts.test:chromium: npx playwright test --project=chromium && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:firefox: npx playwright test --project=firefox && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:webkit: npx playwright test --project=webkit && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:chrome: npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome" && npx allure serve allure-results
